name: TestFit
tagline: AI-powered building configurator for real estate feasibility studies
description: TestFit is an AI building configurator that helps developers, architects, and brokers quickly test-fit buildings on parcels. It generates optimized building layouts in seconds, showing unit mixes, parking configurations, and financial pro formas. This dramatically reduces the time needed for feasibility studies from weeks to minutes, helping real estate professionals evaluate deals faster.
pros: Turns weeks of work into minutes
